text: The Adventurers is a 1970 American adventure drama epic movie directed by Lewis Gilbert and was based on the 1966 novel of the same name by Harold Robbins. It stars Bekim Fehmiu, Charles Aznavour, Candice Bergen, Alan Badel, Fernando Rey, Ernest Borgnine, Willoughby Gray, John Ireland, Zienia Merton, Olivia de Havilland and Allan Cuthbertson and was distributed by Paramount Pictures and produced by Embassy Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1970 adventure movies Category:1970 drama movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Lewis Gilbert Category:Movies set in South America Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in a fictional country Category:1970s epic movies Category:American epic movies Category:Movies about dictators
title: The Adventurers (1970 movie)
